meanings.definition: Being the only one of its kind
meanings.sent1: The uniquest flower in the garden stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent2: Her uniquest talent for painting made her artwork truly special.
meanings.sent3: The uniquest hat at the party was a bright pink cowboy hat.
meanings.sent4: His uniquest way of solving problems involved thinking outside the box.
meanings.sent5: The uniquest gem in the collection sparkled like a rare treasure.

meanings.definition: Having no like or equal; unparalleled
meanings.sent1: The uniquest view from the mountaintop took his breath away.
meanings.sent2: Her uniquest achievement was winning the championship three times in a row.
meanings.sent3: The uniquest dessert at the restaurant was a giant ice cream sundae.
meanings.sent4: His uniquest idea for the project impressed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The uniquest melody in the song lingered in his mind long after it ended.

meanings.definition: Characterized by being the only one of its kind
meanings.sent1: The uniquest book on the shelf had a cover made of recycled materials.
meanings.sent2: Her uniquest feature was her ability to speak multiple languages fluently.
meanings.sent3: The uniquest outfit at the party was a costume made entirely of balloons.
meanings.sent4: His uniquest method of teaching involved using puppets to explain concepts.
meanings.sent5: The uniquest flavor of ice cream he tried was a combination of mango and chili.
